text: Péter "MZP" Márki-Zay (, born 9 May 1972) is a Hungarian politician, marketer, economist, electrical engineer and historian. He has been the mayor of Hódmezővásárhely since 2018. He is the co-founder of the Everybody's Hungary Movement. Márki-Zay won the 2021 opposition primary and is the candidate of the United for Hungary challenging Prime Minister Viktor Orbán in the 2022 parliamentary election. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian mayors Category:Hungarian economists Category:Hungarian engineers Category:Hungarian historians
title: Péter Márki-Zay
